label: 日吉神輿御入洛権門略記
ローマ字1: Hie no shin'yo gojuraku kenmon ryakki
ローマ字1_mod: Hie no shin'yo gojuraku kenmon ryakki
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: ひえ の しんよ ごじゅらく けんもん りゃっき
見出し読み_mod: ひえ の しんよ ごじゅらく けんもん りゃっき
説明文: A record focusing on the goso staged with the holy carts from the Hie shrines during slightly more than a decade in the fourteenth century. Compiled by a monk of Enryakuji's Mudoji section, it covers protests from 1368 to 1380.
